On Wed, 20 Nov 2002 DanielBook@... wrote:

> Nevermind, I found the last dll file.  Tried to play it but after I had hired
> my team and tried to start the level it exited out on me.  Is this purposful
> or an error?

Well, that's definitely not purposeful :-). Does this happen every time
you start? If you start it from a dos shell, does it do the same thing?

Sorry about the crashes. I don't have much time to test Openglad on
Windows, so it has a lot more issues than it does under other systems.

- Zardus
